description.value:
Trigger A non-nindoru creature takes the lid off the cooking pot

Effect All creatures within 15 feet of the pot must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}. The triggering creature instead must attempt a @Check[will|dc:24] save to resist the compulsion to dip their face into the stew and swallow a mouthful of the stuff (this effect has the emotion and mental traits). On a failure, the triggering creature takes @Damage[5d6[poison]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:24|basic] save).

details.description: An unspeakable miasma of foul-smelling vapor with shrieking faces barely visible in the steam bubbles up from the soup.
details.disable: @Check[Cooking Lore|dc:19] to neutralize the haunted soup with the addition of a few select spices from nearby shelves, or @Check[religion|dc:25] to exorcise the haunt

publication.title: Pathfinder Seasons of Ghosts Hardcover Compilation

details.reset: The haunt resets 1 round after the lid is replaced on the cooking pot.
